**Hook:** Ever skipped breakfast because you're short on time? 

**Problem/Setup:** We all know breakfast is the most important meal, yet mornings are crazy busy.

**Solution/Development:** Introducing the 5-minute Avocado Toast with a Twist! Grab a slice of whole-grain bread, toast it to perfection. While it's browning, mash half an avocado. Spread the green goodness on your crispy toast. Here's the twist - sprinkle on some feta cheese, a dash of red pepper flakes, and a drizzle of honey for that sweet and spicy kick. 

**Result/Punchline:** In less time than it takes to check your morning emails, you've got a delicious, nutrient-packed breakfast that'll keep you energized until lunch.

**Call to action:** Try this tomorrow, and start your morning right!
